description: This PHP source file handles AJAX requests related to port forwarding configurations, including adding, editing, activating, and deleting port forwarding rules in a router or network device.
external_files: Device configuration APIs such as getStr, setStr, addTblObj, delTblObj, getInstanceIDs, DmExtSetStrsWithRootObj

methods.name: PORTTEST
methods.description: Checks if the given source or external port falls within the specified port ranges, returning 1 if there is an overlap.
